content: O Chineke gbaghara, mee ebere Nna Onye nwe anyi doo,
Njo nile m mere, Chineke m o gbaghara.
Ike agwugo m o n'ajo omume,
M wee yoba Chineke Nna Onye oma.
Njo egbugo m o Nna n'ezie,
Ana m aghozi Chineke Nna Onye oma.
Mkpuru obi m o n'achosi Gi ike,
E-e wo Chineke Nna Onye oma.
Cheta nkwa Gi Onye kere uwa Nna gbaghara.
Ana m atá»¥kwasi obi na-ebere Onye oma.
